meanings.sent1: She is reexamining her notes before the test.
meanings.sent2: I will be reexamining the evidence to find the truth.
meanings.sent3: The detective kept reexamining the crime scene, looking for missed clues.
meanings.sent4: Reexamining the past can sometimes reveal new insights.
meanings.sent5: He spent hours reexamining the painting, trying to understand its meaning.

meanings.sent1: After the lecture, she reexamined her class notes.

meanings.sent3: The student kept reexamining the textbook, hoping the information would stick.
meanings.sent4: Reexamining the experiment led to a breakthrough discovery.
meanings.sent5: He enjoys reexamining old photographs to relive memories.
